mainText:
We're very very sad this day as humankind lost one of its greatest tech 
soldier and visionary leader - Steve Jobs. It is because of him, I grew 
the affinity to bring work home and work on mac and listen to ipod - it 
has truly  been a generational, cultural and social shift - all because 
of his genius!

May your soul rest in peace!
author: Sukirti
